data.scheme_name: Maharashtra Maritime Development Policy, 2023 - Incentives for Port Projects - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides comprehensive fiscal incentives for port projects, including exemptions from royalties, non-agricultural assessment charges, electricity duty, and stamp duty, along with SGST exemptions, industrial power tariff.
data.eligibility: All existing port units in Maharashtra are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Minimum cargo handling capacity must range from 1 MMTPA to 100 MMTPA, depending on the category of the port project. 

The concession or lease period is up to 30 years. Operators must seek approval one year before the end of the concession or lease period.
data.beneficiaries: All existing port units in Maharashtra are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Minimum cargo handling capacity must range from 1 MMTPA to 100 MMTPA, depending on the category of the port project. 

The concession or lease period is up to 30 years. Operators must seek approval one year before the end of the concession or lease period.
data.context: The Maharashtra Maritime Development Policy 2023 introduced to enhance port infrastructure, attract private investment, and promote sustainable maritime practices.
data.objective: The primary goal of this scheme is to enhance connectivity, promote coastal shipping, and advance skill development within the maritime sector.
data.description:
Exemption from Royalty: No royalty on minor minerals used for port-related development. Exemption from Non-Agricultural Assessment Charges: No charges for land use changes for port operations. 

Exemption from Electricity Duty: No electricity duty during the construction phase. 

Exemption from Stamp Duty: No stamp duty for documents related to port development. Industrial Power Tariff Applicability: Industrial power tariffs for port projects, subject to MERC approval. 

SGST Exemption: Exemption from state goods and services tax on construction inputs. Exemption from Port Dues: No port dues for new port projects.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link: https://aaplesarkar.mahaonline.gov.in/
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the incentives after the approval of concerned authority.
data.checklist_info_a:
Detailed Project report (DPR)
Land Allotment Documents
No objection certificate (NOC)
Permits from MMB
Business Proof
Details of Business
Details of Ownership
KYC Details
Other documents as required
